fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: DataCite follows EU initiatives particularly related to data, open data, research infrastructure, research policy, and issues related to these areas.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Mitglieder der DOI Foundation 
Mitlied des INternational Council of Scientific and Technical Information (ICSTI) 
Assoziiertes Mitglied der Research Data Alliance (RDA)
relevant_communication: DataCite is a partner in the Freya project.
goals__remit: DataCite makes research better by enabling people to find, share, use and cite data. We are a leading global membership organization offering reliable persistent data identification. We engage stakeholders including researchers, scholars, data centers, libraries, publishers, and funders through advocacy, guidance, and services.
